vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.23.8;
son of: Zohar (H6714)
§ Ephron = "fawn-like"
n pr m
1) a Hittite, son of Zohar and the one from whom Abraham bought the field and cave of Machpelah
n pr loc
2) a city on the borders of Benjamin
3) a mountain on the northern border of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   hijo de Sóhar; hitita; (2b)   lugar \ciudad; en la frontera entre los territorios de Efraín y Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以弗崙 这个字在原文的意思是 "像幼鹿的"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 赫人, 瑣轄之子, 亞伯拉罕向他買田和麥比拉洞( 創 25:9)
專有名詞 地名
2) 便雅憫邊境上的城市
3) 猶大北方邊界上的一座山 #書 15:9|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以弗仑 这个字在原文的意思是 "像幼鹿的"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 赫人, 琐辖之子, 亚伯拉罕向他买田和麦比拉洞( 创 25:9)
专有名词 地名
2) 便雅悯边境上的城市
3) 犹大北方边界上的一座山 #书 15:9|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: yam (יָם "Ephron" H3220)
§ Ephron = "fawn-like"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a Hittite, son of Zohar and the one from whom Abraham bought the field and cave of Machpelah
n pr loc
2) a city on the borders of Benjamin
3) a mountain on the northern border of Judah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.41.52;
son of: Joseph (H3130) and Asenath (H0621);
brother of: Manasseh (H4519);
father of: Shuthelah (H7803), Becher (H1071H), Tahan (H8465), Ezer (H5827), Elead (H0496) and Beriah (H1283H); also called Ephrathite (NIV: Ephraimite) at 1Sa.1.1; Ephron (Qere, KJV: Ephrain) at 2Ch.13.19;
Another name of eph.ra.yim (אֶפְרַ֫יִם "Ephraim" H0669)
§ Ephron = "fawn-like"
n pr m
1) a Hittite, son of Zohar and the one from whom Abraham bought the field and cave of Machpelah
n pr loc
2) a city on the borders of Benjamin
3) a mountain on the northern border of Judah
